memberdef.name: BindVectorField

briefdescription.para: Binds a given vector field to the grid.

detaileddescription.para: We assume the field to be of the form: \[ \mathbf{v}(\mathbf{x}) = p(x, y)\hat{\mathbf{i}} + q(x, y)\hat{\mathbf{j}} \]

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the function implementing the $ p $ component of the vector field.
Pointer to the function implementing the $ q $ component of the vector field.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the function implementing the $ p $ component of the vector field.
